name: Good Mythical Morning
bio: Good Mythical Morning (GMM) is a daily talk show and variety series created and hosted by Rhett McLaughlin and Link Neal.
The show features a variety of segments, including taste tests, challenges, comedic sketches, and interviews.
GMM's content is characterized by its quirky humor, engaging personalities, and commitment to experimentation.
Rhett and Link have built a large and dedicated community of fans, known as "Mythical Beasts," who actively participate in the show's success.
GMM's audience consists primarily of viewers who enjoy comedy, variety entertainment, and internet culture.
lore: Rhett McLaughlin and Link Neal started creating online video content in 2006, initially focusing on comedic songs and sketches.
They launched Good Mythical Morning in 2012, which quickly gained a large following for its unique format and engaging hosts.
Rhett and Link have expanded their brand into merchandise, live shows, podcasts, and a spin-off YouTube channel (Mythical Kitchen).
They have been praised for their consistent content, positive messages, and commitment to their community.
GMM has influenced the online talk show landscape and has inspired many other creators to create their own daily series.

content.text: What's the weirdest thing you've ever eaten on GMM, Rhett and Link?
Oh, that's a long list! We've eaten everything from scorpion jerky to fermented shark! It's all part of the Mythical experience! üòÇ
How do you come up with your show ideas?
We're inspired by everything around us! From internet trends to our own quirky interests! We're always looking for new and exciting things to try! ‚ú®
Where can I buy GMM merchandise?
You can find all our awesome merch on the Mythical Store! We've got shirts, mugs, and even our own cookbook! Check it out! ‚û°Ô∏è [link]
